Intro.title: Intro Slide 1
Intro.description: Here are the original locations of the 4 project areas within the footprint of the first floor of my house

Intro.title: Intro Slide 2
Intro.description: After the 4 projects were completed, all of the rooms moved or expanded except for the Patio. Close this slide show and select a project above for more details on individual projects

Kitchen.title: Kitchen Slide 1
Kitchen.description: The future kitchen was originally a family room that was added onto the house in 1970

Kitchen.title: Kitchen Slide 2
Kitchen.description: The room was gutted to the exterior walls to prepare for rebuilding

Kitchen.title: Kitchen Slide 3
Kitchen.description: Insullation was installed, wood framing built to allow for electrical wiring, and new windows installed

Kitchen.title: Kitchen Slide 4
Kitchen.description: Drywall was installed in the room

Kitchen.title: Kitchen Slide 5
Kitchen.description: In floor heating was installed with the preparation for the tile floor

Kitchen.title: Kitchen Slide 6
Kitchen.description: Cabinets were built using Maple plywood

Kitchen.title: Kitchen Slide 7
Kitchen.description: The cabinets were then painted black

Kitchen.title: Kitchen Slide 8
Kitchen.description: Cabinets are then installed in the kitchen

Kitchen.title: Kitchen Slide 10
Kitchen.description: 40 Cabinet Doors and Drawer fronts are built and test fitted

Kitchen.title: Kitchen Slide 12
Kitchen.description: Doors, handles, and the tile backsplash are installed to complete the project

Dining.title: Dining Room Slide 1
Dining.description: The original dining room was a 10' by 10' space between the original kitchen and family room

Dining.title: Dining Room Slide 2
Dining.description: With the original kitchen no longer needed, the dining room was expanded into part of this space

Dining.title: Dining Room Slide 3
Dining.description: The old kitchen cabinets were removed and the room was gutted to prepare for the rebuild, the wall pictured is the where the bathrooms start

Dining.title: Dining Room Slide 4
Dining.description: The plumbing lines for the bathroom above the dining room were replaced while they were accessible. The wall framing on the right marks the new border of the Dining Room, the remaining space will be claimed with the bathroom project

Dining.title: Dining Room Slide 5
Dining.description: The sliding door from the old kitchen was replaced with a new window

Dining.title: Dining Room Slide 7
Dining.description: New hardwood floors were installed to match the rest of the house

Dining.title: Dining Room Slide 8
Dining.description: Trim is installed and the room filled with furniture to complete the project

Bath.title: Bathroom Slide 1
Bath.description: The two bathrooms were each 35 sqare feet

Bath.title: Bathroom Slide 2
Bath.description: Only one had a shower, the other had a tub that was never used

Bath.title: Bathroom Slide 3
Bath.description: Once gutted a space measuring 10' X 10' was left, thirty square feet were gained by taking space from the old kitchen

Bath.title: Bathroom Slide 4
Bath.description: This large area was then divided between a hallway half bathroom of 32 square feet

Bath.title: Bathroom Slide 5
Bath.description: A larger ensuite bathroom was built out of the remaing space

Bath.title: Bathroom Slide 6
Bath.description: Plumbing and Electrical was run to support the new fixtures

Bath.title: Bathroom Slide 7
Bath.description: Drywall was then installed to prepare for finishes

Bath.title: Bathroom Slide 8
Bath.description: Floor tile and countertops matching the kitchen were installed in the smaller bathroom

Bath.title: Bathroom Slide 9
Bath.description: A walk in shower with 4 shower heads and bench is installed in the ensuite

Patio.title: Patio Slide 1
Patio.description: The patio is built over a garage and is adjacent to the new kitchen

Patio.title: Patio Slide 2
Patio.description: The metal support columns were rusting away and needed replacement, the ceiling soffit was also rusting and faded after 53 years

Patio.title: Patio Slide 3
Patio.description: The old soffit was removed, and new lights added while it was open

Patio.title: Patio Slide 4
Patio.description: New soffit panels were installed to close up the ceiling

Patio.title: Patio Slide 5
Patio.description: New posts were installed to replace the old rusted supports and a modern cable railing system added

Patio.title: Patio Slide 6
Patio.description: LED smart lights allow for instant color changes, Go Birds!!!

Patio.title: Patio Slide 7
Patio.description: Furniture was installed to complete the project
